import React from "react"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const BlogChange = () => { const [blogs, setBlogs] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch("../blogs") .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { setBlogs(data); }); }, [blogs]); const updateblogs = () => {}; const deleteblogs = (event, blogId) => { const id = blogId; const url = "../blogs/" + id; console.log(url); fetch(url, { method: "DELETE" }).then(() => console.log("done")); }; return (
